description: FlowSchemaCondition describes conditions for a FlowSchema.

lastTransitionTime.description: Time is a wrapper around time.Time which supports correct marshaling to YAML and JSON.  Wrappers are provided for many of the factory methods that the time package offers.

message.description: `message` is a human-readable message indicating details about last transition.

reason.description: `reason` is a unique, one-word, CamelCase reason for the condition's last transition.

status.description: `status` is the status of the condition. Can be True, False, Unknown. Required.

type.description: `type` is the type of the condition. Required.
